definition: head of a clan/natural leader/person of prestige and authority in a domain/suzerain
school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs
surname Zong
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
suzerain state/mother country (of a colony)
suzerainty

sentences.english: O come, all ye faithful, joyful and triumphant.
sentences.chinese: 齊來宗主信徒，快樂又歡欣。

sentences.english: Supported the demons in the Ogre Battle.
sentences.chinese: 在奧伽戰爭中是惡魔族的宗主。

sentences.english: There is also a reproduction temple in the Chinese camp at Sovereign Hill, Ballarat.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個複製寺，在中國營宗主山，巴拉特。

sentences.english: China had the suzerainty over Ryukyu since Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自明朝以後，中國對琉球一直擁有宗主權。

sentences.english: The second part explains how Li Hongzhang dealt with Vietnam issue.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，李鴻章與越南宗主權的喪失。

sentences.english: Genghis Khan had given Batu’s branch of the family suzerainty over new western additions to the empire.
sentences.chinese: 成吉思汗曾賜予拔都一脈西方新佔領土地的宗主權。

sentences.english: Was abandoned by its Imafumi old Liu Xin said, instead the sovereign classical classics.
sentences.chinese: 由是劉歆拋棄了其今文舊說，轉而宗主古文經學。

sentences.english: After independence we would no longer be at the beck and call of the colonial master.
sentences.chinese: 獨立之後我們將不再聽候殖民宗主國的吆喝和指使。

sentences.english: The Netherlands is Indonesia's former colonial master.
sentences.chinese: 荷蘭是印民在殖民時期的宗主國。

teacher/master

lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
to keep the law/to protect Buddha's teachings/protector of Buddhist law (i.e. temple donor)
disciple/follower/hanger-on (at an aristocrat's home)
paraphernalia of a guard of honor
to perform one's job/attendant/job/duties/(respectful appellation for the addressee) you/your Excellency/(Church) deacon
founder (of a craft, religious sect etc)
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
